description:
Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files. 
	
Aspose.Email makes it easy to work with HTML or plain text emails and their attachments. It allows developers to work against SMTP, POP, FTP and Microsoft Exchange servers. It supports mail merge and iCalendar features, customized header and body, retrieving content, header information and embedded files, Twitter and much more.
releaseNotes:
New features:
NETWORKNET-12296 - Add "All day event" flag in Appointment class
NETWORKNET-33123 - Setting HELO/EHLO string for Smtp
NETWORKNET-33120 - MapiMessage class implements IDisposable
NETWORKNET-33109 - Enhance Printing functionality to include From, To, CC and Subject feilds
NETWORKNET-31811 - Provide EML files validation abilities
NETWORKNET-28435 - Drag drop feature for WPF and Visual Studio 2010
NETWORKNET-33130 - Full Path within a PST File
NETWORKNET-16858 - MapiMessage with digital certificate support

Fixed bugs:
NETWORKNET-33128 - Date parsing problem
NETWORKNET-33114 - Conversion from EML to MHT: Result has "From" field at left top corner

Exception:
NETWORKNET-32798 - Exception while deleting messages from PST
NETWORKNET-33132 - Exception when extracting attachment from a PST message
NETWORKNET-33125 - Exception while connecting to Office 365
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within .NET applications
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
